title: KRISIUN Announces North American Tour Celebrating Conquerors Of Armageddon
description: A full-album performance of their cult classic Conquerors of Armageddon. The post KRISIUN Announces North American Tour Celebrating Conquerors Of Armageddon appeared first on Metal Injection.

byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 7 hours ago
excerpt: A full-album performance of their cult classic Conquerors of Armageddon.
text: Brazilian death metal veterans Krisiun are preparing to bring absolute devastation to North America with a tour built for true believers in brutality. The band has announced a full-album performance of their cult classic Conquerors of Armageddon, unleashing the relentless 2000 milestone in its entirety for the first time across the continent. Get your tickets here. This won't just be another tour — it's a sonic onslaught featuring a hand-picked lineup of underground legends and modern masters of the genre. Joining Krisiun on this hell-forged journey are Los Angeles tech-death pioneers Abysmal Dawn, Long Island's slam death originators Pyrexia, and North Dakota's own death-thrash juggernaut Gorgatron. "Prepare for a sonic annihilation!" the band declared in their official announcement. "Don't miss this carnage." The tour marks a full-circle moment for Abysmal Dawn, who first hit the road with Krisiun nearly two decades ago. "Our first time touring together back in 2006 was actually the first tour we ever did, and we've been friends ever since," said Abysmal Dawn vocalist and guitarist Charles Elliott. html:
Brazilian death metal veterans Krisiun are preparing to bring absolute devastation to North America with a tour built for true believers in brutality. The band has announced a full-album performance of their cult classic Conquerors of Armageddon, unleashing the relentless 2000 milestone in its entirety for the first time across the continent. Get your tickets here.

This won't just be another tour — it's a sonic onslaught featuring a hand-picked lineup of underground legends and modern masters of the genre. Joining Krisiun on this hell-forged journey are Los Angeles tech-death pioneers Abysmal Dawn, Long Island's slam death originators Pyrexia, and North Dakota's own death-thrash juggernaut Gorgatron.

"Prepare for a sonic annihilation!" the band declared in their official announcement. "Don't miss this carnage."

The tour marks a full-circle moment for Abysmal Dawn, who first hit the road with Krisiun nearly two decades ago. "Our first time touring together back in 2006 was actually the first tour we ever did, and we've been friends ever since," said Abysmal Dawn vocalist and guitarist Charles Elliott. "It's a privilege to be blasting together again, this time in support of the anniversary of one of the most extreme metal albums ever made."
